job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to improving customer support outcomes, a key business objective.

job_tasks.phrase: apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This involves enhancing or fine-tuning AI systems based on human feedback and expertise.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions participation in AI model fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new AI tools falls under the development and evaluation of models.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: This involves integrating AI capabilities into existing support systems or workflows, which is a software development task.

soft_skills.phrase: ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on customer support and improving existing AI systems through feedback and fine-tuning rather than developing new generative AI models or complex AI applications. While it involves AI, it lacks the depth in core generative AI development tasks specified for the GenAI Engineer profile.
